title.narrative: Faculty Exchange Program - Africa Veterinary Science

description.narrative: The Faculty Exchange Program enhances the teaching ability of agricultural educators from institutions of higher learning in developing countries. Participants come to the United States for one academic semester (4-5 months) to increase their knowledge of, and ability to teach, agricultural economics, marketing, business and law in a market-based economy.

title.narrative: Borlaug Fellowship Program - Animal Health Governance

description.narrative: This award seeks to address ongoing Kenyan food safety issues through a focus on animal health. Intending to empower states and county governments, Kenya decentralized its animal health and veterinary service delivery systems, leading to a breakdown in disease control reporting and service delivery.
